column4: any idea how much stuff is in a mirror?  i'm concerned i might run out of disk space
one architecture, one release, binary only is ~17G
i've got about 150g so far and dunno  how much to go
it's skipping a lot of non-regular files which seems a little odd
it'll be 17G times edgy, feisty, gusty, hardy, ibex, i386, amd64 times two
easier than figuring out how to filter it
it's a bit rude to grab it all if you're not going to use it
